trans-unit.source: Control that is used to separate items in items controls.
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔項目控制項中之項目的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> control draws a line, horizontal or vertical, between items in controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>控制項可繪製線條、 水平或垂直、 在控制項中，項目之間例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> controls do not react to any keyboard, mouse, mouse wheel, or tablet input and cannot be enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 控制項不回應任何鍵盤、 滑鼠、 滑鼠滾輪或平板電腦輸入，並不能啟用或選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> controls inside <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> elements appear differently from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> controls outside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> 控制內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>項目會出現以不同的方式從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>控制外部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>, the control automatically applies the <xref:System.Windows.Style> identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>，控制項會自動套用<xref:System.Windows.Style>由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Styles are placed in resource dictionaries and are searched for by their keys.
trans-unit.target: 樣式會放置在資源字典中，並依其索引鍵中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to create your new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref:System.Windows.Style>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性以建立您的新<xref:System.Windows.Style>。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個控制項適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer" /> 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自動化基礎結構的一部分。
因型別而異的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。
